languages.text: "Все не так просто, Ваша Светлость. Последний раз Лорд-капитан связывался со мной с точки высадки, в данный момент находящейся строго под брюхом "Обета". Мы потеряли около дюжины шаттлов и нескольких сот разведчиков в первые дни поисков — все они спустились на Кетца Темер и не вернулись".

traits.locale_text: "Все не так просто, Ваша Светлость. Последний раз Лорд-капитан связывался со мной с точки высадки, в данный момент находящейся строго под брюхом "Обета". Мы потеряли около дюжины шаттлов и нескольких сот разведчиков в первые дни поисков — все они спустились на Кетца-аль Хет и не вернулись".

languages.text: "Things are not so simple, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Lord Captain last contacted me from the landing point currently right under the Vow's belly. We lost about a dozen shuttles and several hundred scouts in the first days of the search, all of whom went down to Quetza Temer and never came back."
languages.original_text: "Все не так просто, Ваша Светлость. Последний раз Лорд-капитан связывался со мной с точки высадки, в данный момент находящейся строго под брюхом "Обета". Мы потеряли около дюжины шаттлов и нескольких сот разведчиков в первые дни поисков — все они спустились на Кетца Темер и не вернулись".

traits.locale_text: "Things are not so simple, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Lord Captain last contacted me from the landing point currently right under the Oath's belly. We lost about a dozen shuttles and several hundred scouts in the first days of the search, all of whom went down to Quetza Temer and never came back."

"Things are not so simple, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Lord Captain last contacted me from the landing point currently right under the Oath's belly. We lost about a dozen shuttles and several hundred scouts in the first days of the search, all of whom went down to Quetza Temer and never came back."

"Things are not so simple, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Lord Captain last contacted me from the landing point currently right under the Oath's belly. We lost about a dozen shuttles and several hundred scouts in the first days of the search, all of whom went down to Quetza Temer and never came back."

"Things are not so simple, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Lord Captain last contacted me from the landing point currently right under the Oath's belly. We lost about a dozen shuttles and several hundred scouts in the first days of the search, all of whom went down to Quetza Temer and never came back."

"Things are not so simple, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Lord Captain last contacted me from the landing point currently right under the Vow's belly. We lost about a dozen shuttles and several hundred scouts in the first days of the search, all of whom went down to Quetza Temer and never came back."

languages.text: « C'est plus compliqué qu'il n'y paraît, Votre Seigneurie. Le dernier contact que nous avons eu avec le seigneur-capitaine provenait du site d'atterrissage situé directement en dessous du Serment. Nous avons envoyé des dizaines de navettes et plusieurs centaines d'éclaireurs à sa recherche, mais à l'heure qu'il est, aucun n'est encore revenu de Quetza Temer. »
languages.original_text: "Things are not so simple, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Lord Captain last contacted me from the landing point currently right under the Vow's belly. We lost about a dozen shuttles and several hundred scouts in the first days of the search, all of whom went down to Quetza Temer and never came back."

traits.locale_text: « C'est plus compliqué qu'il n'y paraît, Votre Seigneurie. Le dernier contact que nous avons eu avec le seigneur-capitaine provenait du site d'atterrissage situé directement en dessous du Serment. Nous avons envoyé des dizaines de navettes et plusieurs centaines d'éclaireurs à sa recherche, mais à l'heure qu'il est, aucun n'est encore revenu de Quetza Temer. »

languages.text: “事情没那么简单，大人。舰长大人最后一次联系我，是在目前帝皇誓约号下方的着陆点。最初几天的搜索行动中，我们损失了大约十几架穿梭机和几百名侦察兵。他们去了格扎尔特默，一个回来的都没有。”
languages.original_text: "Things are not so simple, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Lord Captain last contacted me from the landing point currently right under the Vow's belly. We lost about a dozen shuttles and several hundred scouts in the first days of the search, all of whom went down to Quetza Temer and never came back."

traits.locale_text: “事情没那么简单，大人。舰长大人最后一次联系我，是在目前帝皇誓约号下方的着陆点。最初几天的搜索行动中，我们损失了大约十几架穿梭机和几百名侦察兵。他们去了格扎尔特默，一个回来的都没有。”

languages.text: "So simpel ist es nicht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Der Lord Captain hat mich zuletzt von dem Landepunkt aus kontaktiert, der sich momentan direkt unter dem Bauch der Eid befindet. Wir haben in den ersten Tagen der Suche über ein Dutzend Shuttles und mehrere hundert Späher verloren. Sie alle sind hinab auf Quetza Temer gegangen und nie zurückgekehrt."
languages.original_text: "Things are not so simple, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Lord Captain last contacted me from the landing point currently right under the Vow's belly. We lost about a dozen shuttles and several hundred scouts in the first days of the search, all of whom went down to Quetza Temer and never came back."

traits.locale_text: "So simpel ist es nicht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Der Lord Captain hat mich zuletzt von dem Landepunkt aus kontaktiert, der sich momentan direkt unter dem Bauch der Eid befindet. Wir haben in den ersten Tagen der Suche über ein Dutzend Shuttles und mehrere hundert Späher verloren. Sie alle sind hinab auf Quetza Temer gegangen und nie zurückgekehrt."

"So simpel ist es nicht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Der Lord Captain hat mich zuletzt von dem Landepunkt aus kontaktiert, der sich momentan direkt unter dem Bauch der Eid befindet. Wir haben in den ersten Tagen der Suche über ein Dutzend Shuttles und mehrere hundert Späher verloren. Sie alle sind hinab auf Quetza Temer gegangen und nie zurückgekehrt."

languages.text: «No es tan sencillo, {mf|milord|milady}. La última vez que hablé con el Lord Capitán fue desde el punto de aterrizaje justo debajo del interior del Voto. En los primeros días de la búsqueda, perdimos alrededor de una docena de lanzaderas y varios cientos de exploradores. Fueron a Quetza Temer y nunca volvieron».
languages.original_text: "Things are not so simple, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Lord Captain last contacted me from the landing point currently right under the Vow's belly. We lost about a dozen shuttles and several hundred scouts in the first days of the search, all of whom went down to Quetza Temer and never came back."

traits.locale_text: «No es tan sencillo, {mf|milord|milady}. La última vez que hablé con el Lord Capitán fue desde el punto de aterrizaje justo debajo del interior del Voto. En los primeros días de la búsqueda, perdimos alrededor de una docena de lanzaderas y varios cientos de exploradores. Fueron a Quetza Temer y nunca volvieron».

languages.text: 「事はそんなに単純ではありません、陛下。最後にロード・キャプテンから連絡があったのは、現在、『皇帝の誓い』号の船腹真下にあるランディングポイントからでした。捜索初日には十数機のシャトルと数百人の斥候を失いました。彼らは皆ケツァ・テメルへ向かいましたが、誰一人戻ってはきませんでした」
languages.original_text: "Things are not so simple, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Lord Captain last contacted me from the landing point currently right under the Vow's belly. We lost about a dozen shuttles and several hundred scouts in the first days of the search, all of whom went down to Quetza Temer and never came back."

traits.locale_text: 「事はそんなに単純ではありません、陛下。最後にロード・キャプテンから連絡があったのは、現在、『皇帝の誓い』号の船腹真下にあるランディングポイントからでした。捜索初日には十数機のシャトルと数百人の斥候を失いました。彼らは皆ケツァ・テメルへ向かいましたが、誰一人戻ってはきませんでした」

languages.text: "İşler o kadar basit değil {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Lord Kaptan benimle son görüştüğünde Ant'ın tam altında kalan iniş noktasındaydı. Aramanın ilk günlerinde çok sayıda mekiği ve yüzlerce keşif erini kaybettik. Quetza Temer'e inenlerin hiçbiri geri dönmedi."
languages.original_text: "Things are not so simple, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The Lord Captain last contacted me from the landing point currently right under the Vow's belly. We lost about a dozen shuttles and several hundred scouts in the first days of the search, all of whom went down to Quetza Temer and never came back."
